title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 10, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 10, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Quant
items.content_text:
### Python / Trading & Backtesting

*   [AlphaPy (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/ScottfreeLLC/AlphaPy) - Automated Machine Learning \[AutoML] with Python, scikit-learn, Keras, XGBoost, LightGBM, and CatBoost
*   [jesse (⭐6.6k)](https://github.com/jesse-ai/jesse) - An advanced crypto trading bot written in Python

### Python / Time Series

*   [Facebook Prophet (⭐19k)](https://github.com/facebook/prophet) - Tool for producing high quality forecasts for time series data that has multiple seasonality with linear or non-linear growth.

### Rust / Data Visualization

*   [QuantMath (⭐384)](https://github.com/MarcusRainbow/QuantMath) - Financial maths library for risk-neutral pricing and risk
items.content_html:
Python / Trading & Backtesting

  • AlphaPy (⭐1.6k) - Automated Machine Learning [AutoML] with Python, scikit-learn, Keras, XGBoost, LightGBM, and CatBoost
  • jesse (⭐6.6k) - An advanced crypto trading bot written in Python

Python / Time Series

  • Facebook Prophet (⭐19k) - Tool for producing high quality forecasts for time series data that has multiple seasonality with linear or non-linear growth.

Rust / Data Visualization

  • QuantMath (⭐384) - Financial maths library for risk-neutral pricing and risk

items.title: Awesome Cli Apps
items.content_html:
Development / Devops

  • k9s (⭐30k) - Manage Kubernetes Clusters.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [vue-pure-admin (⭐18k)](https://github.com/xiaoxian521/vue-pure-admin) - Background management template based on Vue3, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, element-plus.

### Vue / Helpers

*   ![v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/-v3-35495e) [vite-plugin-vue-gql (⭐214)](https://github.com/wheatjs/vite-plugin-vue-gql) - GraphQL Tags for your Vue SFC.
items.content_html:
Templates / Vue 3

  • vue-pure-admin (⭐18k) - Background management template based on Vue3, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, element-plus.

Vue / Helpers

  • vite-plugin-vue-gql (⭐214) - GraphQL Tags for your Vue SFC.

items.title: Awesome Newsletters
items.content_text:
### PHP / Svelte

*   [PHP Annotated Monthly](https://info.jetbrains.com/PHP-Annotated-Subscription.html). A free monthly newsletter containing latest news from the PHP community and the most interesting PHP articles from around the web. [Archive](https://blog.jetbrains.com/phpstorm/category/php-annotated-monthly/)
items.content_html:
PHP / Svelte

  • PHP Annotated Monthly. A free monthly newsletter containing latest news from the PHP community and the most interesting PHP articles from around the web. Archive

items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### Cloud platform security / Distributed monitoring

*   [OpenTelemetry](https://opentelemetry.io/) - Observability framework for cloud-native software, comprising a collection of tools, APIs, and SDKs for exporting application performance metrics to a tracing backend (formerly maintained by the OpenTracing and OpenCensus projects).
*   [Prometheus](https://prometheus.io/) - Open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit originally built at SoundCloud.

### Cloud platform security / Kubernetes

*   [certificate-expiry-monitor (⭐166)](https://github.com/muxinc/certificate-expiry-monitor) - Utility that exposes the expiry of TLS certificates as Prometheus metrics.
items.content_html:
Cloud platform security / Distributed monitoring

  • OpenTelemetry - Observability framework for cloud-native software, comprising a collection of tools, APIs, and SDKs for exporting application performance metrics to a tracing backend (formerly maintained by the OpenTracing and OpenCensus projects).
  • Prometheus - Open-source systems monitoring and alerting toolkit originally built at SoundCloud.

Cloud platform security / Kubernetes

  • certificate-expiry-monitor (⭐166) - Utility that exposes the expiry of TLS certificates as Prometheus metrics.

items.title: Awesome Irc
items.content_text:
### Clients

*   [Iridium](https://appcenter.elementary.io/com.github.avojak.iridium/) - Friendly IRC client built in Vala and GTK, designed for elementary OS. ([source (⭐56)](https://github.com/avojak/iridium)) `Linux`
items.content_html:
Clients

  • Iridium - Friendly IRC client built in Vala and GTK, designed for elementary OS. (source (⭐56)) Linux

items.title: Awesome Geek Podcasts
items.content_text:
### In Russian

*   [DotNet & More](https://more.dotnet.ru) - Podcast about .NET development and more. Hosted by [Aleksandr Kugushev](https://github.com/kugushev) and [Artem Akulyakov](https://github.com/oxffaa).
*   [Solo on .NET](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAFX7TSEV7SOqEQKnrrFiV7bUY8kN5Qof) - Podcast about software development (programming). Discussed topics are C#, F#, C++, .NET, Visual Studio, Java, CUDA, Xeon Phi, FPGA and much more. Hosted by [Dmitri Nesteruk](https://github.com/nesteruk).
items.content_html:
In Russian

  • DotNet & More - Podcast about .NET development and more. Hosted by Aleksandr Kugushev and Artem Akulyakov.
  • Solo on .NET - Podcast about software development (programming). Discussed topics are C#, F#, C++, .NET, Visual Studio, Java, CUDA, Xeon Phi, FPGA and much more. Hosted by Dmitri Nesteruk.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   [ni-media (⭐250)](https://github.com/NativeInstruments/ni-media) - C++ library for reading and writing audio files. \[MIT]

### JSON

*   [yyjson (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/ibireme/yyjson) - A high performance JSON library written in ANSI C. \[MIT]

### Networking

*   [cpp-httplib (⭐15k)](https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib) - A single file C++11 header-only HTTP/HTTPS server library. \[MIT]
items.content_html:
Audio

  • ni-media (⭐250) - C++ library for reading and writing audio files. [MIT]

JSON

  • yyjson (⭐3.4k) - A high performance JSON library written in ANSI C. [MIT]

Networking

  • cpp-httplib (⭐15k) - A single file C++11 header-only HTTP/HTTPS server library. [MIT]

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Deployment Tools / Discovery

*   [pushnix (⭐34)](https://github.com/arnarg/pushnix) - Simple cli utility that pushes NixOS configuration and triggers a rebuild using ssh.
items.content_html:
Deployment Tools / Discovery

  • pushnix (⭐34) - Simple cli utility that pushes NixOS configuration and triggers a rebuild using ssh.

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### C

*   [cl-cxx-jit (⭐70)](https://github.com/Islam0mar/CL-CXX-JIT) -  Common Lisp and C++ interoperation with JIT. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).

### Shells, shells interfaces / Third-party APIs

*   [Lish (⭐112)](https://github.com/nibbula/lish) - `lish` may someday be a lisp shell. [GPL3](http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html).
    *   supports tab-completion of executables in the path and Lisp symbols, allows to write and to mix shell commands and Lisp code, has a tiny REPL and an interactive debugger, and more.
items.content_html:
C

  • cl-cxx-jit (⭐70) - Common Lisp and C++ interoperation with JIT. MIT.

Shells, shells interfaces / Third-party APIs

  • Lish (⭐112) - lish may someday be a lisp shell. GPL3.
    • supports tab-completion of executables in the path and Lisp symbols, allows to write and to mix shell commands and Lisp code, has a tiny REPL and an interactive debugger, and more.

items.title: Awesome Powershell
items.content_text:
### Podcasts

*   [PowerScripting](https://powershell.org/category/podcast/) - Weekly show run by Jon Walz and Hal Rottenberg.

### Themes

*   [Oh-My-Posh (⭐20k)](https://github.com/jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh) - Tons of beautiful theme that can be enabled by one single command (includes many awesome powerline theme).
items.content_html:
Podcasts

  • PowerScripting - Weekly show run by Jon Walz and Hal Rottenberg.

Themes

  • Oh-My-Posh (⭐20k) - Tons of beautiful theme that can be enabled by one single command (includes many awesome powerline theme).

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Currency Exchange

- API: [National Bank of Poland](http://api.nbp.pl/en.html)

  Description: A collection of currency exchange rates (data in XML and JSON)

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Development

- API: [Kroki](https://kroki.io)

  Description: Creates diagrams from textual descriptions

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Games & Comics

- API: [Lichess](https://lichess.org/api)

  Description: Access to all data of users, games, puzzles and etc on Lichess

  Auth: `OAuth`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Currency Exchange

  • API: National Bank of Poland

    Description: A collection of currency exchange rates (data in XML and JSON)

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

Development

  • API: Kroki

    Description: Creates diagrams from textual descriptions

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

Games & Comics

  • API: Lichess

    Description: Access to all data of users, games, puzzles and etc on Lichess

    Auth: OAuth

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Audio and Video Tools / File Sharing

*   [Omniplayer](https://okaapps.com/product/1470926410#) - Best media player on Mac, support almost all format. [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](macappstore://itunes.apple.com/app/id1470926410?pt=119209922\&l=en\&mt=12\&ct=newhomepage)
items.content_html:
Audio and Video Tools / File Sharing

  • Omniplayer - Best media player on Mac, support almost all format.
